link_desc:
Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise Stellar Wireless AP1101

This template allows you to monitor the Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise (ALE) Stellar Wireless AP1101 in Express / Enterprise mode. Pleaste note that this requires to activate the SNMP functionality via the Express WebGUI on the AP or OmniVista Enterprise management software for the AP-Group.

Features

  • Access Point CPU / Memory & Uptime (with Alert triggers)
  • Access Point Model, Serial, System Name & more
  • Graph Prototypes for CPU / Memory
  • Automatic Discovery of all relevant Radio, WLAN & Network related statistics / metrics
tags: ale, alcatel-lucent enterprise, stellar wireless, access points, ap1101
author: BennyE_HH
